mapper.delete: DELETE FROM coinlog WHERE orderid = #{orderId} AND orderName = #{orderName}
mapper.update: UPDATE coinlog c SET c.status1 = 1 WHERE orderid = #{orderId} AND orderName = #{orderName}
mapper.select: SELECT stuUserId,status1 FROM coinlog WHERE orderid = #{orderId} AND orderName = #{orderName}
select id, groupId, stuUserId, money, coin, left(FROM_UNIXTIME(left(createTime,10)),19) as createTime from coinlog where id=#{id}

select c.id, (select mobile from stuuser where id = c.stuUserId) as account, (select `name` from stuuser where id = c.stuUserId) as username, c.money, c.coin, CAST(LEFT(FROM_UNIXTIME(LEFT(createTime,10)),19) AS CHAR) AS time from coinlog as c,stuuser as s
c.stuUserId = s.id
and s.`name` like CONCAT('%',#{stuUser},'%')
and s.mobile like CONCAT('%',#{mobile},'%')
and unix_timestamp(left(FROM_UNIXTIME(left(createTime,10)),10)) between unix_timestamp(#{startDate}) and unix_timestamp(#{endDate}) ORDER BY c.id DESC
